author: A D
text:
United States-based CommuniClique Inc will probably become the first multinational Information Technology company to set up base in Tirupati.

With Tirupati showing all indications of becoming the technological base of Andhra Pradesh, the company headquartered at Arlington, Virginia, is evincing keen interest to locate its Indian unit in Tirupati. CommuniClique is a web-based voice and SMS Application Program Interface.

“With IIT Tirupati, IISER and several universities, Tirupati is ideal to set up an offshore centre. The social infrastructure such as international airport, road connectivity to Bangalore and Chennai and the scores of star hotels make Tirupati an ideal choice ”, Dr. Parvatha Reddy Balaram Reddy, Chairman of CommuniClique, told The Hindu .
title: Tirupati all set to get first IT multinational
